attributes.action: keep BBC Asian Network for the pleasure of Asians British.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC Trust is to decide soon on shutting down BBC Asian Network to cut costs. This radio station is very popular with Asians citizens of Britain who like to hear the music and news of the countries they come from. The presenters are extremely friendly. The quality of programmes is excellent. BBC Asian Network is heard not only in Britain on Internet by listeners overseas. Shutting down of BBC Asian Network will deprive British citizens of Asian origin of the programmes they enjoy.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
